a. (5) 1.0
0001.0
S = 0
E = 0 -> 0 + 127 = 127 -> 01111111
M = 0000000 00000000 00000000
= 00111111 10000000 00000000 00000000
= 3F800000


b. (5) -16.5
-10000.1
-10000.1 -> -1.00001 * (2**4)
S = 1
E = 4 -> 4 + 127 = 131 -> 10000011
M = 0000100 00000000 00000000
= 11000001 10000100 00000000 00000000
= C1840000


c. (5) 314.25
100111010.01
100111010.01 -> 1.0011101001 * (2**8)
S = 0
E = 8 -> 8 + 127 = 10000111
M = 0011101 00100000 00000000 00000000
= 01000011 10011101 00100000 00000000 00000000
= 439D2000



// conver to binary using floating point method
// move decimal point for M to get 1.M * (2**E)
// S -> sign
// E -> bin(exp + 127)
// M -> bin(M)
// combine all up
